member.summary: Gets the target limit for additional messages in the current month. The number of messages retrieved by this operation includes the number of messages sent from LINE Official Account Manager. Set a target limit with LINE Official Account Manager. For the procedures, refer to the LINE Official Account Manager manual. Note: LINE@ accounts cannot call this API endpoint.

member.name: M:LineMessagingAPI.LineMessagingClient.GetNumberOfMessagesSentThisMonthAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the number of messages sent in the current month. The number of messages retrieved by this operation includes the number of messages sent from LINE Official Account Manager. The number of messages retrieved by this operation is approximate. To get the correct number of sent messages, use LINE Official Account Manager or execute API operations for getting the number of sent messages. Note: LINE@ accounts cannot call this API endpoint.
